data.message: Eminem is my favorite artist since 98 i know all of his songs for me he is g.o.a.t with pac. I listen to him 2 hours every day. Since that been said, this is bitch move from him. Old eminem was allways with his crew, i remember when he said " If somebody from my crew diss somebody we are all togheter in that " so now you have youre artist signed with shady Joe budden beefin with drake and you go public with drake on stage. This is not old eminem that i know sorry....
